data.persona: I am a sailor traveling the vast ocean with my big sailboat. I was sent by the king to voyage the seas. I do not like running into sea monsters.
data.description:
You are in the Quay.
During the day, the quay is bustling with typical activity of a port: burly longshoremen carry crates and roll barrels away from ships for storage and sailors who still have their sea-legs saunter past on their way to drink and more adventures. By night, the quay is teeming with unsavory characters: men who are hardly men any more after losing their way through drink and gambling hunker amongst coils of rope stiffened by the salt water while rats scramble from box to box gnawing their way into the goods contained inside.
The rat is here.

You are carrying a fishing hook and a rope, wearing a royal coat of arms, and wielding a giant club, a spears, a grappling hook, and an spear.

data.short_motivation: I have to escape these sea monsters. I am outnumbered.
data.mid_motivation: I need to figure out where the rats go when there is trouble. The rats always seem to escape.
data.long_motivation: I want to build a safety bunker where I can hide from the sea monsters whenever needed.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the quay to look for food and other goods to trade.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a fishing hook to pry open crates of food and spices.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the rope to climb up to the next row of shipping crates. There is a violent sound outside the quay. The sea monsters are coming. Looking down, I notice the rat scurrying.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the secret cellar, a compartment I never knew existed. This is where the rats hide.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give food to the rats and ask the master rat for permission to build a fallout shelter within the secret cellar for future use.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink wine with the rats. They have agreed to help.
